name: C. Harper KIA, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania; Department of State; Bureau of Professional and Occupational Affairs; State Board of Vehicle Manufacturers, Dealers and Salespersons, Appellees

parties: C. Harper KIA, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania; Department of State; Bureau of Professional and Occupational Affairs; State Board of Vehicle Manufacturers, Dealers and Salespersons, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of January, 2014, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
84 A.3d 323
C. Harper KIA, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania; Department of State; Bureau of Professional and Occupational Affairs; State Board of Vehicle Manufacturers, Dealers and Salespersons, Appellees.
